Articles.Content: Trying to log onto steam logged in but on a random persons account now i know it and cant forget it
Log out, Never log back into that again. Nothing will happen unless you alter something.
Alter their signature to say \'You need to change this account\'s password. Seriously. Anyone could log in.'

Alter their signature to say \'You need to change this account\'s password. Seriously. Anyone could log in.'

Then people would try to get in...

Log into your account, message that account saying you logged in accidentaly and that they should change their password.
I suggest punctuation so I can understand your post the first time I read it >_>

Then people would try to get in...

Log into your account, message that account saying you logged in accidentaly and that they should change their password.

That\'d work too. But its not so provable.

That\'d work too. But its not so provable.

Well, what else?

Well, what else?

Why should there be something else?

I\'ve put forward my opinion, you\'ve put forward yours. Now its up to Shuttle 18 to decide what to do.

Trying to log onto steam logged in but on a random persons account now i know it and cant forget it

Darn. If you can message me my password I\'d appreciate it. I\'ve been trying to remember my password for weeks.

This is a joke - do NOT message me the account or password!! ktbxbai.

Trying to log onto steam logged in but on a random persons account now i know it and cant forget it

Wait was the account minecraftplayer18021?!

If it was you\'d better not of altered anything.
